text: Pheri jaba hajaka sabai adharaharu (karyaharu) pura garisakeka hunchau, taba (menama) allahala'i smarana gara, juna kisimale timiharu aphna purkhaharula'i smarana garne gardathyau, baru tyobhanda pani badhi. Kehi manisaharu yasta chan jo ki vinti gardachan ki he palanakarta! Hamila'i yasa sansarama (uttama kuraharu) pradana gara, ra yasta manisaharuko lagi akhiratama kunai ansa humdainayau
